thread.title: BRIEF-Instacart Says It Discovered Bug That Withheld Tips From Shoppers, Overcharged Users- Blog

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Instacart Says It Discovered Bug That Withheld Tips From Shoppers, Overcharged Users- Blog
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) -
* INSTACART SAYS IT IDENTIFIED A BUG RELATED TO PRODUCT UPDATES MADE AT 2017 END THAT IMPACTED SOME SHOPPERSâ€™ ABILITY TO RECEIVE TIPS- BLOG
* INSTACART SAYS THE BUG THAT IMPACTED LESS THAN 1 PERCENT OF INSTACART ORDERS CAUSED SOME CUSTOMERS TO BE CHARGED SERVICE FEE DESPITE CHOOSING TO WAIVE IT Source text : bit.ly/2BN9OIf Further company coverage: [ ]
